td.a: Generated Summary: lifecycleStatus: proposed; Goals, preferences, and priorities under certain health conditions [Reported]; If I am so sick or seriously injured that I cannot express my own medical treatment preferences, and if I am not expected to live without additional treatment for my illness, disease, condition or injury, then I want my medical care team to know that these are the things that are most important to me: Avoiding prolonged dependence on machines

Generated Summary: lifecycleStatus: proposed; Goals, preferences, and priorities under certain health conditions [Reported]; If I am so sick or seriously injured that I cannot express my own medical treatment preferences, and if I am not expected to live without additional treatment for my illness, disease, condition or injury, then I want my medical care team to know that these are the things that are most important to me: Not being a physical burden to my family
